author: andyc
msg: Updated the ASCII reader to throw an exception if the high bit
is set on the byte. Before, it was silently stripping the high
bit when in reality, if something says that it's strictly ASCII,
then it SHOULD STRICTLY BE ASCII.

author: lehors
msg: got rid of skipSpaces and use skipSeparator instead,
fixed the monitoring of whether we are scanning the internal subset or not
- the tricky part here is that external entities references in the internal
subset must be scanned as the external subset not the internal.
added code to skip the textdecl of external entities when starting to read
one. The code needs to be looked at out though. There are evil interactions
between the pseudo-attributes of the textdecl and the quotes of the entity
value where the PE ref may be found...

author: andyc
msg: Implemented more of the UTF-8 reader.
